extendedInfo.description: A fast action memory matching puzzle game. Quick to learn but difficult to master!Match up the tiles as fast as you can, use special powers to help you win and try to get past the obstacles! This game is suitable for all ages and will improve both your memory and reaction times.If you are any age and you want to play a game that is action packed, improves your memory and is a whole lot of puzzling fun then this is the game for you!Challenge your friends to get to the highest level in the fastest time!**This game is currently in beta. To help improve your experience in the future please give lots of feedback to the developer email address and any ideas that you think may improve the game!**Have fun!**Play this game if you are at school or need to game while commuting,Get better memory by matching and have better reaction times,Want to play a different unique matching game with super powers, bombs, explosions and loads of content,Love crazy colours and want to see a match game thats different to normal and is action packed and funExciting Super Fun Fast Paced Hard Challenging and AddictiveThis is a hard memory puzzle game which challenges your brain, see all the fun colours and get a better memory for christmas. For a memory matching game thats full of explosions and action packed this christmas play the puzzle game KABLAMO!If you got a new phone this christmas and you want to play your first memory game then KABLAMO is super fun, action packed and will help you learn to use the phone quickly.There are no loading screens and no in game ads when playing so you can enjoy the game straight away!This game is fun for all the family, you can challenge children and adults to get the best times and to get glorious victory

reviews.title: Simply amazing!
reviews.comment: It trains your memory. It is  challenging so you won\'t get bored with it. And Evil Monkey is really evil!
reviews.author: Rafa\305\202 Kalita

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: This is a really tough game that requires both the player\'s speed and memory.
reviews.author: Ignacio Elia

reviews.title: Sarah
reviews.comment: Great game and very addictive! Hard to finish but I will complete all the levels eventually!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Could do with better graphics but really addictive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very addicting!
reviews.comment: Incredibly fun and addicting, however it could use a graphical overhaul (I could help!). More power ups and obstacles would be awesome too.
reviews.author: Mohammed Modan

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: So good I cried a little! Get it you won\'t be disappointed!
reviews.author: James Underwood

reviews.title: Very Fun!
reviews.comment: it\'s simple but very fun game, recommend to all
reviews.author: Ci A
